  • Method Details

    • initConfig

      private void initConfig()
      initializes the content of logoIcon (String) and iconFile (array of String) with the information in the file specified in the constant CONFIGFILE

    • setPiece

      public void setPiece​(int row, int col, int piece)
      Display the specified play piece on the specified slot
      Parameters:
      row - row of the slot
      col - column of the slot
      piece - index of the piece to be displayed

    • highlightSlot

      public void highlightSlot​(int row, int col, Color colour)
      Highlight the specified slot with the specified colour
      Parameters:
      row - row of the slot
      col - column of the slot
      colour - colour used to highlight the slot

    • unhighlightSlot

      public void unhighlightSlot​(int row, int col)
      Unhighlight the specified slot to the default grid colour
      Parameters:
      row - row of the slot
      col - column of the slot

    • setScore

      public void setScore​(int point)
      Display the score in the corresponding textfield
      Parameters:
      point - the score to be displayed

    • setMoveLeft

      public void setMoveLeft​(int num)
      Display the number of moves left in the corresponding textfield
      Parameters:
      num - number of moves left to be displayed

    • showInvalidMoveMessage

      public void showInvalidMoveMessage()
      Display a pop up window displaying the message about invalid move

    • showChainSizeMessage

      public void showChainSizeMessage​(int chainSize)
      Display a pop up window specifying the size of the chain(s) that is (are) formed after the swap
      Parameters:
      chainSize - the size of the chain(s) that is (are) formed

    • showGameOverMessage

      public void showGameOverMessage​(int point, int numMove)
      Display a pop up window specifying the game is over with the score and number of moves used
      Parameters:
      point - the score earned in the game
      numMove - the number of moves used in the game
